api_list.name: Flag
api_list.description: GET flag of a country searching by name

api_list.name: American Countries
api_list.description: Get all American countries and facts about them
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-facts.p.rapidapi.com/region/america"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-facts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
